unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss the Saree (and Your Sanity)!
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss the Saree (and Your Sanity)!

unnormalised: Alright folks, let's talk about flash sales. You know, those heart-stopping, adrenaline-pumping events that promise you the deal of a lifetime on everything from a pressure cooker to a handloom saree from Kanchipuram? They’re like the IPL finals of shopping – high stakes, nail-biting tension, and the very real possibility of utter disappointment.

unnormalised: We've all been there, haven't we? It's a Tuesday afternoon, you’re sipping your chai and scrolling through Instagram, when BAM! An ad pops up: "70% OFF EVERYTHING at Sharma Ji's Emporium! Today Only!" Suddenly, you’re possessed. Forget that report due to Dr. Verma; your mission is clear: score that discount!

unnormalised: If you're lucky, you emerge victorious, clutching your virtual saree like a newly-won lottery ticket. If not, well, there's always next time. Just remember, flash sales are like that autorickshaw ride in Mumbai: exhilarating, slightly terrifying, and you’re never quite sure where you’re going to end up. And always double check the shipping charges – Rs. 99 extra can sting like a chili in your aloo paratha! Good luck, shoppers! May the odds (and the server capacity) be ever in your favor.
